## Course Overview

This course covers observational research methods using R with the OHDSI/HADES ecosystem. Over eight sessions, you'll learn to work with the OMOP Common Data Model, run standardized analyses, and use Strategus to orchestrate studies.

## Sessions

### Session 1: The R Workflow

Environment, dependencies, and data foundations.

- [Slides](slides/01_r-workflow/slides.html)
- [Notebook: R Foundations](modules/01_r-workflow/r-foundations.html)

**Topics covered:**

- R as an interpreter, sessions, environments
- Packages: installation, loading, library paths
- Git and GitHub, Personal Access Tokens
- System vs R dependencies, Java setup
- renv for reproducibility
- Introduction to databases
